content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT 
   TOP 100 *
   FROM
   OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
   ) as trip_data;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
   TOP 100 *
   FROM
   OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''trip_data_green_delta'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
   ) as trip_data';

-- Try querying sub folders

SELECT 
   TOP 100 *
   FROM
   OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/year=2020',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
   ) as trip_data;
